Bosses.Name: Shiva
Bosses.InDepthStrategy:
Spread for markers, avoid AoEs. Stack for "Diamond Dust".
When the floor fogs up, it'll become slippery. If you hit the outside wall, you'll freeze.
Bosses.QuickStrategy:
Spread for markers, avoid AoEs. Stack for "Diamond Dust".
When the floor fogs up, it'll become slippery. If you hit the outside wall, you'll freeze.
